An Ethic of Relationship

Foreword

The Ethics of Caring is an extraordinarily helpful and
groundbreaking new book for healers, clergy, therapists, and
bodyworkers that illuminates what is necessary to offer wise and
trustworthy relations to their clients.

Preface

While studying to obtain my master's degree in marriage
and family counseling, I was required to take a course in ethics.
